00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_BLOOM_FILTER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_BLOOM_FILTER_H
00024 
00025 #include <cmath>
00026 #include <limits.h>
00027 #include "Common/StaticBuffer.h"
00028 #include "Common/MurmurHash.h"
00029 #include "Common/Logger.h"
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace Hypertable {
00033 
00038 template <class HasherT = MurmurHash2>
00039 class BasicBloomFilter {
00040 public:
00041   BasicBloomFilter(size_t element_count, float false_positive_prob) {
00042     m_element_count = element_count;
00043     m_false_positive_prob = false_positive_prob;
00044     double num_hashes = -std::log(m_false_positive_prob) / std::log(2);
00045     m_num_hash_functions = (size_t)num_hashes;
00046     m_num_bits = (size_t)(m_element_count * num_hashes / std::log(2));
00047     HT_ASSERT(m_num_bits != 0);
00048     m_num_bytes = (m_num_bits / CHAR_BIT) + (m_num_bits % CHAR_BIT ? 1 : 0);
00049     m_bloom_bits = new uint8_t[m_num_bytes];
00050 
00051     for(unsigned ii = 0; ii< m_num_bytes; ++ii)
00052       m_bloom_bits[ii] = 0x00;
00053 
00054     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"num funcs="<< m_num_hash_functions
00055                  <<" num bits="<< m_num_bits <<" num bytes="<< m_num_bytes
00056                  <<" bits per element="<< double(m_num_bits) / element_count
00057                  << HT_END;
00058   }
00059 
00060   ~BasicBloomFilter() {
00061     delete[] m_bloom_bits;
00062   }
00063 
00064   /* XXX/review static functions to expose the bloom filter parameters, given
00065    1) probablility and # keys
00066    2) #keys and fix the total size (m), to calculate the optimal
00067       probability - # hash functions to use
00068   */
00069 
00070   void insert(const void *key, size_t len) {
00071     uint32_t hash = len;
00072 
00073     for (size_t i = 0; i < m_num_hash_functions; ++i) {
00074       hash = m_hasher(key, len, hash) % m_num_bits;
00075       m_bloom_bits[hash / CHAR_BIT] |= (1 << (hash % CHAR_BIT));
00076     }
00077   }
00078 
00079   void insert(const String& key) {
00080     insert(key.c_str(), key.length());
00081   }
00082 
00083   bool may_contain(const void *key, size_t len) const {
00084     uint32_t hash = len;
00085     uint8_t byte_mask;
00086     uint8_t byte;
00087 
00088     for (size_t i = 0; i < m_num_hash_functions; ++i) {
00089       hash = m_hasher(key, len, hash) % m_num_bits;
00090       byte = m_bloom_bits[hash / CHAR_BIT];
00091       byte_mask = (1 << (hash % CHAR_BIT));
00092 
00093       if ( (byte & byte_mask) == 0 ) {
00094         return false;
00095       }
00096     }
00097     return true;
00098   }
00099 
00100   bool may_contain(const String& key) const {
00101     return may_contain(key.c_str(), key.length());
00102   }
00103 
00104   void serialize(StaticBuffer& buf) {
00105     buf.set(m_bloom_bits, m_num_bytes, false);
00106   }
00107 
00108   uint8_t* ptr(void) {
00109     return m_bloom_bits;
00110   }
00111 
00112   size_t size(void) {
00113     return m_num_bytes;
00114   }
00115 
00116 private:
00117   HasherT    m_hasher;
00118   size_t     m_element_count;
00119   float      m_false_positive_prob;
00120   size_t     m_num_hash_functions;
00121   size_t     m_num_bits;
00122   size_t     m_num_bytes;
00123   uint8_t   *m_bloom_bits;
00124 };
00125 
00126 typedef BasicBloomFilter<> BloomFilter;
00127 
00128 } //namespace Hypertable

00130 #endif // HYPERTABLE_BLOOM_FILTER_H
